title: State of the Season: Mid-season followup

replies.body: Malz passive "healthy". Can I get a free banshees on my other champions too, please?
it would be fine if it was a free banshee... but its more like a kayle ulted him and morg used e on him for 2 sec
Sigh :( but he's still kinda fun at the moment :) {{item:3078}}  OP!
Don't clickerino this.
It's a scam!
It's a trap!
I'm begging to see these links again. They're so amusing to see.

I want an actual response, when the hell are you going to fix the bloody minion block, its actually a real problem, its like a permanent Emperors Divide, they constantly block you when you're trying to lane and just generally moving, your own minions shouldn't be a disadvantage to you. Even champs like Kassadin who can freely move through minions can get minion blocked!! wtf Riot.
I only play ARAM. Too many toxic kids in SR. ARAM is the same now as when I started playing this game 4 years ago. Why do you hate ARAM so? Can you not give some love to ARAM?

You're reworking Ryze again? Really? Ryze can be shut down but once he's snowballed he's really hard to stop. I'd think lay off touching him for a while instead of buffing him, because that's the least we need to do.

Why would you assume rework = buff? For most champions their reworks end up amounting to an appreciable nerf. Ryze is being reworked because his last one sent his skill cap through the roof, and anyone who can work with that is rather unstoppable. So the rework is intended precisely the issues you point out with him.
Fix your bloody ranked games I waited 30 mins for a game with trolls and a game shorter than the bloody queue times. I should of just left the game by name
by then*
I wanted to know if you guys are working on an item that will suffice the trinity change for champs like yasuo, gangplank and corki?
Pretty sure none of them care about the changes to Triforce, and are actually fine with the new triforce.
I'm pretty sure gangplank would like to to see the crit back seeing as he is quite reliant on it.

From what i have seen it doesn't really matter and the switch has been to more Armor penetration over the crit now.

Crit was never a main thing for GP.
Why is adc getting more and more nerfed? while ap and assisans can one shot you what is the point of the ad role ? feed enemy team?

"so we also want to see how it performs in pro play before considering any possible changes." 
I don't want to take the pelt of the bear before killing it, but if Rito keep thinking like that and not give credit to the Lol community everything will go downhill just like star craft.{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

I know people think the Zyra rework hit the mark but I disagree. Her plants do a lot of damage, which isn't a bad thing, but Zyra doesn't have to hit any abilities for them to attack. I think that takes a lot of skill out of Zyra, and the fact that she can just spam abilities and deal tons of damage is a problem in my eyes. Make her plants only attack champions if they're hit by the skillshot, or balance it in some other way. Other than that she's good.

yeah it's kinda like if {{champion:420}} 's tentacles would just attack nearby enemies without her using her w 

Zyra should have something like that just to add some minor mechanics to her to make her less unpleasing to play against

You will find that in her changes, the plant damage was actually _nerfed_ by ~20% (base and AP). And while, sure, she can now have more plants around thanks to her passive, the addition is only incidental unless you actually manipulate or predict the enemy's engagement, which is something that requires considerable skill to pull off. If her plants are still causing trouble otherwise, that's simply a matter of people not respecting that they shouldn't step near an amassed pile of 5 seeds while Zyra is around to activate them.
Gosh {{champion:163}} already feels powerful to me, and they're giving her another buff next patch!? O: Oh my gosh!

she feels powerful, but is abysmal if you dont take barrier and/or get early feeding

its because her spells take a while to put out damage, and are quite easy to dodge

Thank God Malzahar is going to get nerfed again. I like his new playstyle, cause before, he would pop like a balloon if caught out and was extremely easy to keep your distance from him. Now he can actually pull off combos without being interrupted. Good job Guys

Looking forward to that Taliyah buff!
good stuff

The reason I think the cloud drake has the same win rate as the other dragons is because you take the dragon when you're winning (Usually). So most of the time when you're winning, it doesn't really matter what dragon you take, however it can "help" you close out the game, but yeh cloud drake sucks.
TL;DR Cloud drake has only roughly the same win rate because the team that is already winning takes it

hey riot, bring back heart of gold. this message was brought to you by T.C.G (the crew of gold) {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}} 

edit: not actually a real thing.

Rito could you please show some love for kennen{{champion:85}}  maybe add a few items that relate to energy as none do yet or just ap scaling incease on his e as it is pretty lackluster in a fight doing practacly no damage and only being used for escapes or to apply a mark of the storm.

For this recent update (6.11) I  think that sooo many things have modified that it really just ruins the play style of certain characters or make existing over powered characters even stronger, such as Zyra where her kit is now on the face roll level or Lucian now soo under powered and not just as a person who plays lucian or Zyra but fighting them too i find them much easier to kill or much more difficult. Lucian just has no power anymore and yes you can still make great plays with him but since the reduction of his Q,W range its become much harder as u really have to get close in to land the shot this effects his entire kit as it does a portion of it original damage and has even less range but the Cool down is untouched, meaning u have no power to poke or kill and no skills to use after the first skill combo. on top of the fact that his Autos do not do as much as some Auto focused ADCs. Zyra, very simple her root range is stupid and once she gets her root off she just hits a spell or two and ur dead or so close before u even get out of stun. U talk about how powerful Lucian was before his nerfs? Try face rolling on Zyra, like actually putting ur face on the keyboard and rolling it cuz i bet u that u could get a kill.
Wut about... bring back solo queue.
